item.title: The Rise of Consumer Health Wearables: Promises and Barriers
item.description:
The Rise of Consumer Health Wearables: Promises and Barriers

Lukasz Piwek and colleagues consider whether wearable technology can become a valuable asset for health care.

item.title: Sage Bionetworks Advocates for Open Systems in Health Research
item.description:
Sage Bionetworks Advocates for Open Systems in Health Research

SEATTLE--()--Sage Bionetworks, a nonprofit biomedical research organization, continues its work to redefine the way in which health data is gathered, shared and used through the use of open systems, incentives and norms. In a Nature commentary published today, a set of governing principles for digital health data analysis that are designed to maximize the contribution of large-scale digital data to advancing medical care are described.

item.title: Breathalyzer with Webcam and GPS Cleared by FDA |
item.description:
Breathalyzer with Webcam and GPS Cleared by FDA |

Compliance testing can be an important part of an alcohol rehab program. There are many alcohol breathalyzers on the market, but they generally require a trusted individual to perform the test to prevent forging of the results.
